abstract: Israeli forces shoot and kill Palestinian affiliated with Hamas, during raid in West Bank, after he prepares to throw pipe bomb at them.
lead_paragraph: Israeli forces killed a member of the Palestinian Islamist group Hamas during a raid in the occupied West Bank on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; West Bank: Palestinian Is Killed

snippet: Israeli forces killed a member of the Palestinian Islamist group Hamas during a raid in the occupied West Bank on Wednesday.
